amendment.description: Amendment eliminates the $30 million Agency for International Development (AID) reform and downsizing account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 14 in the Congressional Record of June 20, 1995, to eliminate the $30 million in funds appropriated for AID reform and downsizing account, and to reduce the funds appropriated for AID operating expenses by $69 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 182 (Roll no. 423).
